title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling wrappers.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with model management, RAG, and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Conversational TUI for Ollama written in Go; supports chat history, markdown, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot (sammcj/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completion.

title: ollama-rag (glangchain/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + LangChain to chat with PDFs entirely locally.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; chat, generate, pull, and embed.

title: ollama-rs (pepperoni21/ollama-rs)
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; provides strongly-typed chat, generate, and embedding APIs.

title: ollama-chat (npm)
summary: Lightweight CLI chat tool published on npm that wraps ollama-js for quick terminal conversations.

title: ollama-streamlit (rclong/ollama-streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chat UI that connects to local Ollama; supports model switching and conversation export.

title: ollama-csharp (tryAGI/ollama)
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with Source-generated REST bindings.

title: ollama-helm (jameskim0987/ollama-helm)
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose (ollama/ollama-docker)
summary: Official Docker image and compose examples for CPU & GPU (CUDA/ROCm) setups.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/haystack-integrations)
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as Generators or Embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot (mikegoll/ollama-discord-bot)
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into channels with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot (sfazli96/ollama-slack-bot)
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local Ollama models into Slack threads with @ mentions.

title: ollama-elixir (mmore052/ollama-elixir)
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama with GenServer-backed connection pooling and streaming.

title: ollama-rust-embeddings (mdrokz/ollama_rust)
summary: Rust crate focused on generating embeddings with Ollama and computing fast similarity search.
